io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.executors

Class JdkThreadPoolExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.AbstractExecutorService
      • java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor
        • io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.executors.JdkThreadPoolExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Executor, ExecutorService

    public class JdkThreadPoolExecutor
extends ThreadPoolExecutor
    Executor that support uncaucht exceptions and interruptable threads.
    Version:
    2.0.3.0 2015-11-30 17:37:13
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.kernel
